meanings.definition: A standard of perfection or excellence.
meanings.sent1: Her ideals of kindness and honesty guide her actions.
meanings.sent2: His ideals of hard work and dedication inspire others.
meanings.sent3: His idea of the perfect sandwich is one with peanut butter and pickles - strange, but to each their own ideals!
meanings.sent4: In the world of art, her paintings are the ideals of beauty and grace.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's ideals of fairness and equality are evident in how she treats all her students.

meanings.definition: A principle or value that one actively pursues.
meanings.sent1: The company's ideals of innovation and creativity drive their success.
meanings.sent2: His ideals of integrity and respect shape his interactions with others.
meanings.sent3: His pursuit of the ideal cup of coffee led him to try beans from all over the world.
meanings.sent4: In the competitive world of sports, his ideals of teamwork and sportsmanship set him apart.
meanings.sent5: The community's ideals of unity and cooperation make it a great place to live.
